page.title: 03LIVING IN WILMSLOW.
page.content: We interviewed two residents of Wilmslow about what it is like to live here. Their viewpoints are quite different. Mrs Travis,an elderly lady has lived in Wilmslow all her life.She thought Wilmslow is not as nice as it was.There is a lot of money in Wilmslow now and it's not as friendly any more.Mrs Travis thought that Wilmslow has changed a lot as there are different people,more shops and many more vehicles. Mrs Willard,an American, has just moved to England.She was apprehensive when she first came, but was happy to come to England.She says we talk funny but people have gone out of their way to be friendly. She thinks Wilmslow is very convenient but it is hard to park the car when out shopping.
